table {
	overflow-y: hidden;
	overflow-x: auto;
	display: block;
}

table.wikitable {
	background: transparent !important;
	border: none;
}

table td {
	min-width: 100px;
	background: transparent;
}

body.wgl-theme-light .wikitable td {
	background-color: #f8f9fa;
}

body.wgl-theme-dark .wikitable td {
	background-color: #2f2f2f;
}
